titles: To the supreme authority of this nation in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of the Lord Major and Court of Aldermen of the Citie of London.
author: Sadler, John, 1615-1674.
England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: The petition is signed: J. Sadler.
